verbs.description: [ARG0: author] [V: defends] [ARG1: humboldt broncos book] [ARGM-LOC: amid families protests the author of a book about the humboldt broncos and the deadly bus crash that rocked the junior hockey team] says he had good intentions in choosing to publish the story the crash in april killed 16 people and injured 13 more when the team bus collided with a semi - truck at a rural intersection in saskatchewan humble beginnings of the humboldt broncos and the 2017 - 2018 team written by barry heath came out last month several people who lost loved ones in the wreck say they did n't want the book published and have asked people not to buy it humboldt broncos saskatchewan barry heath saskatoon ryan hockey president michelle straschnitzki
